xml.log: If there is an update when the file file is missing, go to Steam Client - Library List - mydockfinder - right-click menu - Properties - Local File - Verify software file integrity If the desktop icon is not displayed after enabling pre-stage scheduling, you can right-click on the desktop-view-display desktop icon to enable display desktop icon Changelog 1.Fixed an issue where minimized animations occasionally caused crashes 2.Fixed the issue that the pre-stage scheduling using snipaste screenshot display was abnormal 3.Fixed the issue that the dock run icon sometimes did not disappear 4.Fixed an issue where the shutdown animation occasionally displayed an exception 5.Fixed the issue that the myfinder button displayed overlap after sleep wake-up 6.Fixed the issue that the pre-stage scheduling window would pause wallpaper playback when using wallpaper 7.Revised Swedish translation, thanks to @debuggforbussiness 8.Fixed Bulgarian translation, thanks to @Трифон Иванов 9.Fix other issues 10.Update the digital signature of software code, all previous old versions of digital signatures will expire on May 17, 2023, after expiration, the antivirus software may report a danger warning, it is recommended to update to the latest version
